column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I started running low on ice coffee
column2: then boom! Like an angel from the heavens Emily swoops in to get me a refill. I didn't ask but didn't mind either... When she can back I tried to slip her a tip
column3: just to show my appreciation and let her know I can provide. "She just responded with "Nah
column4: this one is on me..." I'm still blushing.
